name: FreeThrow
0:
”Alexa, ask Free Throw what to throw pizza boxes into”
”Alexa, ask Free Throw which bin to put cds into”
”Alexa, ask Free Throw where to put egg cartons”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: free throw
des:
Every time trash goes into the wrong bin, recyclable waste is contaminated and a landfill expands unnecessarily.

Free Throw is an app that lets Seattle residents easily determine which bin to throw away trash into. Features include -
- 250+ categories of items
- additional information on correct disposal for each item
- built on environmentally friendly serverless architecture
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
